HelpMapper.GetCompany: SELECT * FROM dbo.Company t WHERE t.CompanyId=@CompanyId;
HelpMapper.GetTeamList: SELECT *, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT uf.UserId) FROM dbo.UserFocus uf WHERE uf.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND uf.ObjectTypeId=t.ObjectTypeId AND uf.ObjectId=t.ObjectId ) FocusTotal, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT tm.UserId) FROM dbo.TeamMember tm WHERE tm.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND tm.ObjectTypeId=t.ObjectTypeId AND tm.ObjectId=t.ObjectId AND tm.Status=1 ) MemberTotal FROM ( SELECT 1 Type, t.TeamId Id, t.ObjectTypeId, t.ObjectId, t.ObjectName, t.CreateDate FROM dbo.Team t WHERE t.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND t.Status=1 AND t.ObjectTypeId=@OjectTypeId UNION ALL SELECT 0 Type, t.MySelfTeamId Id, t.ObjectTypeId, t.ObjectId, t.ObjectName, t.CreateDate FROM dbo.MySelfTeamRelation t WHERE t.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND t.Status=1 AND t.ObjectTypeId=@OjectTypeId ) t ORDER BY t.Type ASC, t.CreateDate DESC;
HelpMapper.GetTeamFocusMemberUserList: SELECT CASE WHEN m.UserId IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN x.UserId IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT('[',ISNULL(x.UserId,y.UserId),']','User表数据不存在') END ELSE CONCAT('[', m.UserId, '] ', m.ChnName, ' | ', m.Email) END FocusUser, CASE WHEN n.UserId IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN y.UserId IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT('[',ISNULL(x.UserId,y.UserId),']','User表数据不存在') END ELSE CONCAT('[', n.UserId, '] ', n.ChnName, ' | ', n.Email) END MemberUser, ( SELECT b.RoleTypeName+'/' FROM( SELECT DISTINCT t.RoleTypeId FROM dbo.TeamMember t WHERE t.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND t.ObjectTypeId=@OjectTypeId AND t.ObjectId=@OjectId AND t.Status=1 AND t.UserId=ISNULL(x.UserId,y.UserId) ) a INNER JOIN dbo.RoleType b ON a.RoleTypeId=b.RoleTypeId FOR XML PATH('') ) RoleTypes FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT t.UserId FROM dbo.UserFocus t WHERE t.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND t.ObjectTypeId=@OjectTypeId AND t.ObjectId=@OjectId ) x FULL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT t.UserId FROM dbo.TeamMember t WHERE t.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND t.ObjectTypeId=@OjectTypeId AND t.ObjectId=@OjectId AND t.Status=1 ) y ON x.UserId=y.UserId LEFT JOIN dbo.[USER] m ON x.UserId=m.UserId LEFT JOIN dbo.[USER] n ON y.UserId=n.UserId ORDER BY ISNULL(x.UserId, y.UserId) ASC;
HelpMapper.GetCompanyManager: SELECT CONCAT('[',u.UserId,']',u.ChnName,'|',u.Email) FROM dbo.[User] u WHERE u.UserId IN(SELECT uc.UserId FROM dbo.UserCompany uc WHERE uc.CompanyId=@CompanyId AND uc.IsManager=1);
